br.span: The Twinsburg City School District is closed, Monday, March 16th through Tuesday, June 2nd. Students will be learning from home during this period. Please click here for TCSD 2020 School Closure information including distance learning, communications and family resources.

img.title: twinsburg tiger logo
img.a: April 28, 2020 Blackboard Connect School Closure Update

br.span: Last night, the Twinsburg Council PTA virtually met for the last meeting of this school year. We looked back at the 19/20 school year and we looked ahead to the 20/21 school year.....

img.title: meal icon
img.a: Participation in the Twinsburg City School District's COVID-19 Meal Program

br.span: During the school closure for COVID-19, the Twinsburg City School District will continue to make breakfast and lunches available to students who are eligible for the Federal Free and Reduced-Price Meal Program or...

img.title: chromebook with tools on screen
img.a: Service on TCSD Issued Student Chromebooks During School Closure

br.span: During the extended period of school closure, if you have a broken/dead Twinsburg City School District issued Student Chromebook please click on the title of this article on how to proceed....

img.title: students standing in a line
img.a: TCSD Guidance for Students With Disabilities

br.span: The following guidance for Students with Disabilities (SWD) is based on information provided to us by the Ohio Department of Education (ODE) and a webinar through the United States Department of Education (USDOE) on Friday, March 13th....
Congratulations to Twinsburg High School senior Emma Unangst who was selected as a State Winner for this year’s Ohio Governor’s Youth Art Exhibition.....

img.title: aspiring artists
img.a: THS Artists Chosen for State Judging

br.span: Also, we are Tiger Proud to share the names of our other Twinsburg High School artists who’s artwork was chosen for state judging in consideration of the Ohio Governor’s Youth Art Exhibition.....
A giant “Tiger Thank You” to everyone who is working to create a once-in-a-lifetime memory for our Class of 2020! The virtual Commencement ceremony being planned will surely be enjoyed.....

img.title: twinsburg schools today
img.span: Check Out Our April Edition of "Twinsburg Schools Today"

span.div: Superintendent Kathi Powers and Business Manager Chad Welker update the school community about the state of the District during the COVID-19 school closure during the April edition of "Twinsburg Schools Today". Click here to access the April edition.

img.title: children of the world uniting
img.a: Story Behind "Children of the World - Uniting"

br.span: We are very Tiger Proud of our very talented students who performed the song, "Children of the World - Uniting" the inspirational piece about having hope in this time of global health crisis......
